Dolphins' D'oh!
 




LB Joey Porter's age (30) is one of several concerns.  (US Presswire)



    

    

      Joey Porter makes a lot of noise and, thanks to Miami, a lot of money. 
      You know what else the $32M man makes? Pete Prisco's list of most 
      overrated players. As for underrated, it's time to praise 
      the Pats' Ty Warren.
    

  
Full story Related Links:• Warren mourns teammate | Reports | Photos | SPiN:  Goodell's justice• Sked | Rumors | Movement | Prisco: Points | Rankings |  Power NFL.com:• Schefter: Porter still in hot water | Kirwan: Contract conditions drama


 


 

 





 No surprise here: Donovan bolts at right opportunity


    

      
      Billy Donovan leaves Florida and enters the NBA to coach Orlando. 
      Despite two titles, Gary Parrish says Donovan's choice was a no-brainer 
      as he was destined for more.
    

  
• Mejia: Win-win | UF: Next? | Billy bolts |  Donovan


 

 





 Goldstein: Just another advantage for long-flying Ducks


    

      
      Anaheim is not too 
      worried about the long flight to Ottawa taking a toll on 
      the team. The West Coast club is used to and knows how to deal with this 
      type of traveling routine.
